about_the_game:
Welcome to Hunt Grounds, a multiplayer horror survival experience where players must navigate the terrifying Hunt Grounds, an abandoned and dangerous location where hunters and survivors face off in a deadly game of cat and mouse.

As a survivor, your mission is simple: stay alive. Scavenge for essential supplies, unlock hidden escape routes, and use powerful supernatural items to turn the tide in your favor. Whether you choose to team up with others or go alone, you’ll need to stay sharp as the hunters relentlessly track your every move.

As a hunter, the thrill of the hunt is your calling. Use your heightened senses to track down survivors, unleash your unique abilities to corner your prey, and eliminate anyone who stands in your way. Each hunter has their own terrifying powers, ensuring that no two hunts are ever the same.

Key Features:

  • Tense Multiplayer Matches: Face off in thrilling 1 vs 4 asymmetrical gameplay, where the hunter must stop survivors from escaping.

  • Supernatural Crafting: Survivors can gather materials and craft chaos relics to teleport, rewind time, vanish from sight etc..

  • Diverse Playstyles: Choose from a variety of hunters and survivors, each with unique skills and strategies.

  • Dynamic Maps: Navigate eerie, atmospheric environments full of danger and secrets waiting to be uncovered.

Whether you prefer outwitting your opponents as a cunning survivor or dominating the hunt as a fearsome predator, Hunt Grounds offers an intense, high-stakes multiplayer experience where survival is everything.

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Frequent Violence and general Mature Content

name: Hunt Grounds Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4170 or AMD FX-8120
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GPU GeForce GTX 660 / AMD GPU Radeon HD 7870
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or later
  • Processor: Intel i7-6700 / AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1070 / Radeon RX 480
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: Hunt Grounds is an intense, asymmetric multiplayer horror game where one player becomes a relentless hunter, while the others must work together, or alone, to survive the hunt.
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Japanese, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America
*languages with full audio support
